title: Correction Notice
summary: The newsletter highlights corrections to previous statements regarding Washington State counties transitioning to Phase 4 reopening under the Roadmap to Recovery. It emphasizes updated guidelines for public meetings under Proclamations 20-28 and 142, stressing the need for compliance with 'Miscellaneous Venues' regulations.
compressed_content: Correction Notice Updated guidelines for public meetings under Proclamations 20-28 and 142. Compliance with 'Miscellaneous Venues' regulations required. Stay informed about state changes related to emergency declarations.
search_text: Fireho, Volume 19, Number 5E, correction, meetings, phase 4, proclamation, public agencies, public records, emergency services, contract law
corruption_notes: Missing essential fields: date. This newsletter may have incomplete data extraction.
